1306060.name: Golf Club Architect
1306060.description:
Golf Club Architect is a game about creating, managing and playing your very own golf course.

Start out with a few simple holes to get those green fees rolling in and as your funds accumulate further refine, grow and decorate your course to satisfy your customer's skill and aesthetic needs.

Architect It

Golf Club Architect provides a variety of tools allowing you to customise your golf course. Tools included:

  • Terrain tools for raising/lowering, flattening and smoothing.

  • Prop placement including foliage and decorations.

  • Paths for linking various parts of your course together.

  • Surfaces including a variety of roughs as well as greens, bunkers and fairways.

Play It

Golf Club Architect is not just about architecting a golf course but playing it to! Create your very own golfer using the character creator and play the course yourself.

Analyse It

Analyse your golf course with the happiness and beauty overlays as well as the course reviews left by AI golfers.

Please feel free to join our community on Discord: .
